functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Aerokinesis Scroll, Class 3\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"An advanced and efficient form of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"telekinesis that bypasses the soul","color":"gray"}','{"text":"barrier by twisting the energy","color":"gray"}','{"text":"through one\'s own barrier and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"counteracting the upward force","color":"gray"}','{"text":"upon oneself.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Levitate Nearby Foes","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:64,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:7,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUID:[I;-1271700608,-108520624,507236888,-455542143],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
